summary: This document is a summary of account transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016. It details the account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers during the month. The document is marked confidential and is part of the Epstein case investigation.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $56,542,688.38 on July 1, 2016.
Significant outgoing transfers included $2,000,000.00 on July 7, $125,000.00 and $500,000.00 on July 14, and $1,800,000.00 on July 19.
The ending balance of the account as of July 31, 2016, was $52,124,543.91.
Interest earned during the period was $6,855.53, with a year-to-date total of $57,053.30.
The document contains instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
